DOC.brief_summary: This study seek assess durability response persistence resistance ombitasvir/ paritaprevir/ritonavir Japanese participant enrol Phase 2 3 clinical study agent treatment chronic hepatitis C .
DOC.brief_title: The Durability Response Persistence Resistance AbbVie 's 2 Direct-acting Antiviral Agent ( 2D ) Therapy Japanese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Participants treat Study M12536 M13004 2D regimen ( ombitasvir/ paritaprevir/ ritonavir ) complete 48 week followup , regardless SVR achievement . Participants agree sign inform consent Participants treat directacting antiviral agent ( DAA ) immediately Study M12536 M13004 .
